content: please note that the paid pattern is the ad-free and printable pdf version of a free online pattern on supergurumi com **free english version** https //www supergurumi com/amigurumi-crochet-mouse-bookmark **free german version** https //www supergurumi de/amigurumi-maus-lesezeichen-haekeln **free spanish version** https //www supergurumi com/es/patron-de-crochet-raton-marcapaginas-amigurumi **free french version** https //www supergurumi com/fr/tutoriel-marque-page-souris-au-crochet-souris-livre **free dutch version** https //www supergurumi com/nl/muis-boekenlegger-haken the **book mouse** involuntary bookmark with absolute eye-catching guarantee **about the pattern ** the crochet pattern comes as a printable pdf and is available in english us terminology german spanish french and dutch the pattern is written in detail and extensively illustrated available as an instant download after purchase the finished bookmark has a length of approximately 31 cm **materials used ** this pattern was crocheted using the „schachenmayr catania yarn 100% cotton meterage 125 m yarn ball weight 50 g yarn weight sport - 5ply / fine 2 in the following colors black schwarz 110 white weiß 106 taupe taupe 254 dahlia dahlie 409 2 5 mm crochet hook tapestry needle polyfill scissors **techniques you need to know ** magic_ring chain stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease / increase color change sewing ***have fun crocheting ***
